summary: Yes - another mod that alters the Destruction skill tree. But this one will only add a plus 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50% destruction spell effect boost (damage) on advancement through the Destruction ranks... And nothing else. No fancy new spells, no naked khajiits. Nothing.
descriptionHtml:
IM CURRENTLY WORKING TO FIX A BUG THAT MADE EVERY SPELL MAGNITUDE IN THE GAME FOLLOW THE TREE. THE MOD WILL BE UPLOADED AS SOON AS I\'M SHURE I\'VE FIXED IT PROPERLY. IT WILL BE WORTH THE TIME. 

This mod alters the Destruction skill tree, to boost your Destruction spell magnitude (damage) for every advancement in the tree. 
No other effects are altered or removed (you\'ll still get the Â½ magica perk for every advancement).

The numbers: 

Novice destruction 	= 	+ 10% 
Apprentice destruction 	=	+ 20% 
Adept destruction 	=	+ 30% 
Expert destruction 	=	+ 40% 
Master destruction 	=	+ 50% 

You\'ll get the feeling of really mastering magic.

For example the \"flames spell\" will start out as 8 points of damage per second. 

With novice destruction 	= 	 8 dmg/sec 
With apprentice destruction 	= 	10 dmg/sec
With adept destruction 		= 	13 dmg/sec
With expert destruction 	= 	19 dmg/sec
With master destruction 	= 	28 dmg/sec

It may seem overpowered when you look at the numbers... 
But with the enemies gaining levels I find it pretty spot on. 

It also helps when fighting modded dragons on higher difficulty :)

Enjoy!
